Text: Please seed people!! Even stuck at 86% I was able to watch the entire film (with dropouts of course) to the end credits. Great film! The bits with 'de' cutting himself into the film eighteen years later is a real treat. If I ever get to 100% I will be quite happy to seed this -- and any another de Antonio films anyone might be able to upload. Loved Point of Order and In the Year of the Pig, am *dying* to see Rush to Judgement, Millhouse, Underground, Mr. Hoover and I...anything by de Antonio! Thanks.
